import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import './style.css' const SideMenu = () => { const isLoggedIn = useSelector(state => state.auth.isLoggedIn); const isSideMenuOpen = useSelector(state => state.siteLayout.isSideMenuOpen); const userMenu =
const guestMenu =
if(isLoggedIn) return userMenu else return guestMenu } export default SideMenu;
